001package edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.Menu;
006import android.view.MenuInflater;
007import android.view.MenuItem;
008import android.view.View;
009import android.view.ViewGroup;
010import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
011import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
012import androidx.core.view.MenuProvider;
013import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
014import androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity;
015import androidx.lifecycle.Lifecycle.State;
016import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
017import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
018import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.R;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.adapter.NextQueueAdapter;
021import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.databinding.FragmentGameBinding;
022import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Dealer;
023import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Field;
024import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.entity.Score;
025import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.entity.User;
026import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.viewmodel.PlayingFieldViewModel;
027import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.viewmodel.ScoreViewModel;
028import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.viewmodel.UserViewModel;
029import java.time.Instant;
030
031public class GameFragment extends Fragment implements MenuProvider {
032
033  private FragmentGameBinding binding;
034  private PlayingFieldViewModel playingFieldViewModel;
035  private ScoreViewModel scoreViewModel;
036  private UserViewModel userViewModel;
037  private int score;
038  private int level;
039  private int rowsRemoved;
040  private User currentUser;
041  private Boolean inProgress;
042  private boolean running;
043
044  @Override
045  public View onCreateView(
046      @NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState) {
047    setupUI(inflater, container);
048    return binding.getRoot();
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
053    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
054    setupViewModels();
055    requireActivity().addMenuProvider(this, getViewLifecycleOwner(), State.RESUMED);
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  public void onDestroyView() {
060    binding = null;
061    super.onDestroyView();
062  }
063
064  @Override
065  public void onCreateMenu(@NonNull Menu menu, @NonNull MenuInflater inflater) {
066    inflater.inflate(R.menu.game_options, menu);
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  public void onPrepareMenu(@NonNull Menu menu) {
071    MenuProvider.super.onPrepareMenu(menu);
072    menu.findItem(R.id.play).setVisible(!running);
073    menu.findItem(R.id.pause).setVisible(running);
074  }
075
076  @Override
077  public boolean onMenuItemSelected(@NonNull MenuItem item) {
078    boolean handled = true;
079    int id = item.getItemId();
080    if (id == R.id.play) {
081      playingFieldViewModel.run();
082    } else if (id == R.id.pause) {
083      playingFieldViewModel.stop();
084    } else if (id == R.id.restart) {
085      playingFieldViewModel.create();
086    } else {
087      handled = false;
088    }
089    return handled;
090  }
091
092  private void setupUI(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container) {
093    binding = FragmentGameBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
094    binding.setLifecycleOwner(getViewLifecycleOwner());
095  }
096
097  private void setupViewModels() {
098    LifecycleOwner owner = getViewLifecycleOwner();
099    FragmentActivity activity = requireActivity();
100    setupPlayingFieldViewModel(activity, owner);
101    setupScoreViewModel(activity, owner);
102    setupUserViewModel(activity, owner);
103  }
104
105  private void setupUserViewModel(FragmentActivity activity, LifecycleOwner owner) {
106    userViewModel = new ViewModelProvider(activity)
107        .get(UserViewModel.class);
108    userViewModel
109        .getCurrentUser()
110        .observe(owner, (user) -> this.currentUser = user);
111  }
112
113  private void setupScoreViewModel(FragmentActivity activity, LifecycleOwner owner) {
114    scoreViewModel = new ViewModelProvider(activity)
115        .get(ScoreViewModel.class);
116  }
117
118  private void setupPlayingFieldViewModel(FragmentActivity activity, LifecycleOwner owner) {
119    playingFieldViewModel = new ViewModelProvider(activity)
120        .get(PlayingFieldViewModel.class);
121    getLifecycle().addObserver(playingFieldViewModel);
122    binding.setPlayingFieldViewModel(playingFieldViewModel);
123    playingFieldViewModel
124        .getPlayingField()
125        .observe(owner, this::handlePlayingField);
126    playingFieldViewModel
127        .getDealer()
128        .observe(owner, this::handleDealer);
129    playingFieldViewModel
130        .getInProgress()
131        .observe(owner, this::handleInProgress);
132    playingFieldViewModel
133        .getRunning()
134        .observe(owner, this::handleRunning);
135  }
136
137  private void handlePlayingField(Field playingField) {
138    score = playingField.getScore();
139    level = playingField.getLevel();
140    rowsRemoved = playingField.getRowsRemoved();
141  }
142
143  private void handleDealer(Dealer dealer) {
144    NextQueueAdapter adapter = new NextQueueAdapter(requireContext(), dealer.getQueue());
145    binding.nextQueue.setAdapter(adapter);
146  }
147
148  private void handleInProgress(Boolean inProgress) {
149    if (Boolean.FALSE.equals(inProgress) && Boolean.TRUE.equals(this.inProgress)) {
150      Score score = new Score();
151      score.setStarted(Instant.now()); // FIXME: 10/26/23 This should come from repository.
152      score.setValue(this.score);
153      score.setRowsRemoved(rowsRemoved);
154      scoreViewModel.save(score, currentUser);
155    }
156    this.inProgress = inProgress;
157  }
158
159  private void handleRunning(Boolean running) {
160    this.running = running;
161    requireActivity().invalidateOptionsMenu();
162//    binding.moveLeft.setEnabled(running);
163//    binding.moveRight.setEnabled(running);
164//    binding.rotateLeft.setEnabled(running);
165//    binding.rotateRight.setEnabled(running);
166//    binding.drop.setEnabled(running);
167  }
168
169}
